Name: Burning Floor
Effect: All participants take 2 fire damage at start of each round
Thematic_Description: The arena floor is covered in flames

Name: High Winds
Effect: All ranged attacks have disadvantage (roll twice take lower result)
Thematic_Description: Powerful gusts disrupt projectiles and spells

Name: Darkness
Effect: All attacks have -2 to hit (subtract 2 from roll before checking hit/miss)
Thematic_Description: Pitch black arena - visibility near zero

Name: Poison Gas
Effect: All participants gain 1 Poison token at end of each round (2 HP/turn for 3 rounds)

Name: Unstable Ground
Effect: On natural 1 on any die roll player falls prone (lose next action)

Name: Arcane Surge
Effect: All spells deal +3 damage. All spell users take 1 HP when casting
Thematic_Description: Wild magic energy saturates the arena
